snippet: Colombia’s largest rebel group has freed an army general and two others whose capture led President Juan Manuel Santos to break off peace talks with the rebels, the president said Sunday.
abstract: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia, country's largest rebel group, frees Gen Ruben Dario Alzate and two other prisoners whose capture led Pres Juan Manuel Santos to break off peace talks with them.
lead_paragraph: Colombia’s largest rebel group has freed an army general and two others whose capture led President Juan Manuel Santos to break off peace talks with the rebels, the president said Sunday.
